about.title: About Me
about.content: Hi! I'm Eren, a developer who enjoys writing code in the .NET ecosystem and building modern web projects. Clean code, sustainability, and clear architectural principles are my top priorities. I value teamwork and pay attention not only to communication but also to structure and standards in every project. I aim to follow new technologies and apply them in practice to build systems that are not only functional but also maintainable.
